title: Star Wars Yoda Stories for Game Boy Color
creator_credit: Lucasfilm, Ltd., Torus Games and THQ
material_description: Cartridge videogame. Cartridge and manual in cardboard box
brief_description: Despite being based off of the Star Wars universe, Star Wars: Yoda Stories lacks a central plot or definitive goal. Instead, the game is designed to be infinitely playable in short bursts, where goals are randomly generated and the levels are procedurally made. Despite the variety, the game always starts the same, where the player, as Luke Skywalker, arrives at Dagobah in an X-Wing. Goals are then given by Yoda after he is found.
